features: 𝐊𝐞𝐞𝐩 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐩𝐡𝐨𝐧𝐞 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐧 𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐜𝐡: This smartphone mount is the perfect accessory for laptop or desktop monitors, allowing you to conveniently keep your phone within arm's reach while using your computer.

𝐄𝐧𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐝𝐮𝐚𝐥 𝐬𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐧𝐬: Easily view text messages, watch videos, or answer calls while working on your computer, thanks to this mount's compatibility with all kinds of flat computer displays. Enjoy the benefits of a dual-screen setup and improve your productivity.

𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐏𝐡𝐨𝐧𝐞 𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐨 𝐚 𝐰𝐞𝐛𝐜𝐚𝐦: With the built-in Continuity Camera feature, you can easily flip the magnetic arm of this laptop phone holder to use your iPhone as a webcam via continuity mode. The perfect solution for high-quality video calls and FaceTime.

𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐭 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐝𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧: This smartphone mount is designed to be foldable and portable, allowing you to save space and carry it with ease. It's the ideal choice for travelers and business professionals who need a convenient phone holder on the go and doubles as a second screen.

𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐭𝐨 𝐮𝐬𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐬𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐚𝐜𝐡𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: Setting up this phone holder is a breeze. Featuring a magnetic attachment system, this ensures optimal alignment, especially for chargers, and offers a quick and easy way to connect or disconnect accessories. Just peel off the protective tape of the mounting base, connect it to the back of your desktop or laptop monitor, and rotate the stand arm to reveal the magnetic stand. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Too me like 2 minutes to figure out how to use. It’s been staying at the back of my monitor in the past 5 days and it’s still there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ok but could be better
reviews.reviewText: It sticks well and holds onto the phone well. The build quality is nice. There's just nothing to hold it in place except for the fact that it only swivels 180 degrees. I doubt this would work in a car because it just swivels freely so it would swing around when you turn. It's light and it does attach your phone to things but I think the only thing you can really use it for is desktop monitors. On a laptop you can flip the magnet around so it doesn't scratch the back of the screen but it sticks out so much that it's pretty impractical.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There’s no way to tighten the tension at the pivot joint and over time it loses the ability to keep your phone in place. Just flops down. Would be great otherwise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Get it right the first time
reviews.reviewText: Make sure you get it right the first time. Once you stick it that’s a wrap. I had to peel it off to try again and then it wouldn’t stay. The did supply a second adhesive with the package, but then the second Time wasn’t right either. It’s hard to determine the clearance on both the top and side. I wish there was some kind of template to pinpoint the proper placement.That being said. The device won’t balance straight unless your device is plumb up against the side of the laptop. The first time I placed the holder it had about a 1/2 inch of clearance and the phone would tilt on the magnet left or right. It wouldn’t sit straight. I reapplied the adhesive to the light and then I got it plumb on the side but then there wasn’t enough clearance at the top. Sadly I’m out of adhesive so this will be a side mount.Also another thing I didn’t consider…the whole tilt apparatus is why I went with this one over the other options…but it tilts the device AWAY from you. Not towards. Not sure why you’d want to do that.Knocked stars off because the installation wasn’t so elegant. I’m sure you’re thinking I’m just an idiot and didn’t place it correctly, but I spent a good amount of time trying to get evettthing lined up and with the right clearance. God forbid I change the case on this phone and it’s gonna be a whole different story.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Outstanding quality, amazing adhesion. Super strong magnet. Love the flexibility! Sturdy and simple. A+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a decent phone holder - very strong and stable, but requires commitment
reviews.reviewText: This is a decent magnetic phone holder and has a degree of versatility, however the base must be permanently affixed to whatever will be supporting the phone. In other words, if you intend to use this to attach your phone to your laptop - keep in mind the holder will be attached to your your laptop for the rest of it's functional life.The extension arm rotates about 180 degrees (90 degrees in either direction off center), and the stand includes an extra adhesive pad in the event you need to relocate it. The side that accommodates the phone can pivot (tilt) on it's own axis, but not towards you monitor, only away from it, so best case scenario the unit can only be even with the monitor, never tilted slightly inward (this could be a problem if the back of the monitor isn't completely parallel with the monitor surface). This feels like a design flaw to me.Lastly, it includes one magnetic ring to affix to the removable device (in the event you're using a non-Mag-enabled device).So - it will certainly do the job to give you the ability to magnetically affix your phone (or similar device) to another flat surface. It will give you a moderate degree of versatility, and it's reasonably sturdy and stylish in appearance. I HIGHLY recommend you plan the placement of the unit ahead of time, before you choose to buy this. I would not recommend this as a gift,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a permanent magsafe continuity camera
reviews.reviewText: I used to have a clamp that I could snap my phone into above my monitor. If you aren't using a continuity camera, I've definitely heard that my Teams meetings look a lot better.Note that this does use the red 3m adhesive, which STICKS. So, make sure you have the thing where you want it. I do, and it holds great, and also is pretty adjustable. I'd probably need to get another one if I get a new monitor, but thankfully that doesn't happen much.My magsafe phone (14 Pro) sticks like crazy, and I see no reason to ever get something else. If you don't have a magsafe phone, it does come with a metal ring adapter that you can stick to an existing case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The magnetic ring came right off my phone after I tried taking it off the magnet from my computer. I let it Stick for a bout an hour it it easily came off.
